name: buildscope
desc: A contemporary urban development focusing on sustainable design. It seamlessly integrates green spaces with high-rises, offering a fresh take on metropolitan living.

name: ecomoda
desc: A forward-thinking retail space built for fashion. With its airy interiors and minimalistic design, ecomoda brings luxury and environment-consciousness together under one roof.

name: horizon
desc: An avant-garde residential complex overlooking the city. Horizon merges comfort with modern design, boasting panoramic views, spacious layouts, and top-tier amenities.

name: sculpterra
desc: An artistic masterpiece of landscape architecture. Sculpterra molds natural elements with human ingenuity, creating a harmonious blend of sculpture and earth, perfect for contemplation and inspiration

name: urbanplus
desc: A mixed-use hub in the heart of the city. Urbanplus prioritizes efficient space utilization, offering residents, businesses, and visitors a dynamic and vibrant community experience.
